Talk to us on freenode IRC: #ubuntu-mt

=== Introduction ===
Malta is a small island situated in the center of the Mediterranean sea.<<BR>>
Malta's main role in IT is translation, as Maltese have a vast knowledge of languages.<<BR>>
But recently the acceptance of Smart-City project in Malta which now has boosted Malta's position in Information Computer Technology.<<BR>>
